comments.text: We just wanted to get from the beach to metro station while it was already dark, after 3-5 minutes, an Arab woman stopped.

Stood here 30 mins with a sign for dubai. There was a big space to pull over and a bustop. In that time 2 wannabe taxi drivers stopped and wanted 20 dirhams (english speaking) for Al ain alone. The bigger problem was some annoying Indian dude kept walking over (very slowly) to tell me nobody would stop, in the process blocking the pull in place and making that all the more likley. Low on time and couldn't be bothered so when the bus stopped I took it (requires hafilat card). Ymmv, but not as fri
